Interface Memory

All Known Implementing Classes:
MarsMemory
public interface Memory

This interface contains the methods that must be implemented by the shared memory. Since the MARS memory is circular, if the indexes used to read and write the memory exceeds the memory bounds, a modulus operation is used to obtain the correct index.

Method Summary
 Cell readCell(int index)
          Reads and returns a cell from the specified position of the memory.
 void writeCell(int index, Cell cell)
          Writes and returns a cell from the specified position of the memory.
 

Method Detail

readCell

public Cell readCell(int index)
Reads and returns a cell from the specified position of the memory.

Parameters:
index - the index of the cell to be read

writeCell

public void writeCell(int index,
                      Cell cell)
Writes and returns a cell from the specified position of the memory.

Parameters:
index - the index of the cell to be stored
